addressleaf.section:
An Extract of m
r
Bodleighes Instructions being sent to the
Duke of Brunswicke
.

page.lettertext:
fol.176r
The effect of M
r
Bodleighes Instructions sent
to the D: of Brunswike.
To acquaynt him w
th
what care hir Ma
tie
hathe sondrie
tymes heretofore and nowe presently doth advertise the
K.
of Denmark
& Princes of
Germanie
of the dangerouse
combination of the Catholicque Princes &
the Pope
a-
gaynst all Princes
fessing the gospell, for the puttyng
in execution of the Cowncell of
Trent
: the attempt of
the
D: of Guyse
nowe in
Fraunce
tendyng to this
end.
That hir Ma
tie
thincketh good
some convenient place for the meetyng
the Princes
testants C
o
missioners to be appoynted
in Germanie as shortly as may be, there to consult
& agre howe to joyne together for their c
o
mon defence:
whether she will send some speciall person.
That he would conveighe hir Ma
ties
l
re
s to the
dukes of
Saxonie
,
Brandeburghe
, and the
Lantgrave of Hesse
beeyng to theffect aforesayd: &
cure hir speedie
answeare from them of their purpose and place to
be appoynted for the meetyng of the sayd Commissi-
oners.
To desyre him to impart the substance of this negotiation
to the
Dukes of Holst
,
Pomeran
,
Mechelburghe
& other
Princes Erls & some Cities of the Confession of
Aus-
burghe
in those parts that they may joyne in sending
to the assemblie: & Restrayne all levyes of men in
their territories to serve agaynst anie of the Relligion
To pray the sayd D: of Brunswike to order his preacher
s
not to revive controversies of relligion well appeaced,
but in their sermons & writynges to exhort unto u-
nitie: and to exhort the princes his neighbo
rs
to doe
the lyke.
That he would pray the townes of the steds to concurre
w
th
the Princes of Germanie in this intended assem-
bye: and to send their C
o
missioners to the same.
fol.176v
To acquaynt the sayd D: w
th
a memoriall of the treacherouse
dealyngs of the Jesuites in Fraunce.
